resources.string: First, Power on the Chair.\n Second, turn on the bluetooth and the application will connect automatically to the chair.\n Third , you should turn on LocationServices (GPS) from your mobile device settings.
First, press on \' Move \' from your main dashboard.\n -You will see directions .\n -To move press on the direction arrows.

Open \' Move \' to be connected and from the top right corner you will see the dropdown scroll to choose your desired speed to move with , this speed also will be saved to move with it from the hand kit.\n - You have 4 different speeds to choose from.
First, press on \' Battery \' from your main dashboard.\n -You will see the live remainig battery percentage of the chair .

First, Power on the Chair.
 Second, Power on the Handkit. 
 -Handkit will automatically connect to the chair.
 -Start using the Handkit Tattoo to move the chair to the desired direction.
How to see the chair\'s remaining Battery percentage ?
How to control the chair with the app ?
Live Percentage of Your Chair Battery Remaining.
